name: di-ipv-core-front
description: User interface for the Identity Proofing and Verification (IPV) system within the GDS digital identity platform, GOV.UK Sign In.

scripts.build: yarn build-sass && yarn build-ts && yarn minfiy-build-js && yarn copy-assets
scripts.build-sass: rm -rf dist/public/steets && sass --no-source-map src/assets/scss/application.scss dist/public/stylesheets/application.css --style compressed
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Sass,TypeScript,Node" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold" "npm run watch-sass" "npm run watch-ts" "npm run watch-node"
scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p dist && copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.html dist/ src/locales/**/** dist/ && copyfiles -a static/* && copyfiles -u 3 src/assets/javascript/*.js dist/public/scripts
